featured.text: For example, Egyptian culture would not have become so well-known if the museums had not put Egyptian mummies on show.
Mummies have also been found with onions and onion flowers 39 their pelvis, chest, ears, eyes, and feet.

definition.zh_def: 用防腐劑處理過的屍體，通常是古埃及人為了防止腐爛而進行的處理。
definition.en_def: A body that has been embalmed and dried, especially in ancient Egypt, to prevent decay.
definition.example: The archaeologists discovered a mummy in the ancient tomb.
